track.name: It's Been Awhile
comments: This is a song that should not be listened to when you are in the dumps.XD  Very powerful.
Wish it had been a while since I heard Staind incessantly b!tch & moan..
And to think this is the song that nobody wanted to listen to when Aaron performed it at the bars in his early years..
Hell yea it's been a while!
Its been a while since I've heard this song :)
What an awesome song, haven't heard it in ages, absolutely love it! [2]
What an awesome song, haven't heard it in ages, absolutely love it!
saw them perform live on Audience Network and they were awesome
It's been a while since I could stand on my two feet again
Nostalgia overload. One of my favorite songs, period.
been awhile for me too,,,,,i hope they play this at my funeral,,,,as everyon lights up,,,,,,,,,,,if you agree,,,,,friend me
this song is sex. (the british probably will appreciate this comment more than americans.)
